name: net_version
summary: Returns the chain ID associated with the current network

result.name: chain id
result.summary: chain ID associated with the current network
result.description: Common chain IDs:  '1' - Ethereum mainnet  '3' - Ropsten testnet  '4' - Rinkeby testnet  '42' - Kovan testnet  Note: See EIP-155 for a [complete list](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-155.md#list-of-chain-ids) of possible chain IDs.
